fastener_types.name: Hex Bolt
fastener_types.description: Hexagonal head bolt with external threading, partially or fully threaded

fastener_types.name: Hex Bolt (Full Thread)
fastener_types.description: Hexagonal head bolt with full external threading along the entire length

fastener_types.name: Socket Head Cap Screw
fastener_types.description: Cylindrical head with internal hexagon (Allen key) drive

fastener_types.name: Carriage Bolt
fastener_types.description: Smooth rounded head with square neck to prevent rotation

fastener_types.name: Stud Bolt
fastener_types.description: Threaded rod without head, threaded on both ends

fastener_types.name: Flange Bolt
fastener_types.description: Hex bolt with integrated flange washer

fastener_types.name: Eye Bolt
fastener_types.description: Bolt with looped head for attaching ropes or cables

fastener_types.name: Anchor Bolt / Foundation Bolt
fastener_types.description: Used to anchor structures to concrete foundations

fastener_types.name: Hex Nut
fastener_types.description: Standard hexagonal nut with internal threading

fastener_types.name: Lock Nut (Nylock)
fastener_types.description: Hex nut with nylon insert for vibration resistance

fastener_types.name: Flange Nut
fastener_types.description: Hex nut with integrated flange for load distribution

fastener_types.name: Wing Nut
fastener_types.description: Nut with wing-shaped flanges for hand tightening

fastener_types.name: Castle Nut / Slotted Nut
fastener_types.description: Hex nut with slots for cotter pin to prevent loosening

fastener_types.name: Thin Hex Nut (Jam Nut)
fastener_types.description: Reduced height hex nut for locking purposes

fastener_types.name: Plain Washer (Flat Washer)
fastener_types.description: Flat disc for load distribution under bolt head or nut

fastener_types.name: Spring Washer (Lock Washer)
fastener_types.description: Split ring washer providing spring tension to prevent loosening

fastener_types.name: Heavy Duty Plain Washer
fastener_types.description: Thicker plain washer for heavy-duty applications

fastener_types.name: Machine Screw
fastener_types.description: Small fastener for use with nuts or tapped holes

fastener_types.name: Self-Tapping Screw
fastener_types.description: Screw that creates its own thread when driven into material

fastener_types.name: Wood Screw
fastener_types.description: Tapered screw designed for wood applications

fastener_types.name: Set Screw (Grub Screw)
fastener_types.description: Headless screw used to secure rotating parts
